text: Released in 1972,

The Godfather is a movie
 about the Italian mafia, which stars

Marlon Brando as Don Vito Corleone
 and the head of the Corleone family.

The movie also stars Al Pacino
 as Michael Corleone, Vito's youngest son.

Today, we've selected
 two scenes from this iconic movie
for you to learn English with.

But before we start, every week

and advanced learners like you to improve
